title: kalladha EzhaiyallavO
sahitya:
kallaada EzhaiyallavO evvaaRu unRan

karuNai peRuvEn sollammaa

(kallaada)



anupallavi



kollaada maa tavam

konDOr tozhum ninRiruk

kOmaLa cEvaDi

taamaraiyil maDama na maDangavE

(kallaada)



caraNam



poyyan kolai seyyum kuDikEDan

punmozhiyaaDi perum kaLavaaDi

veyyan koDiyan kuDiyan kEDi

viDargaLil munnaaDi

mey anbu enbadu siRidum illaada

vEDamiTTa aashaaDabooti ena



vaiyagattuLLOr vasaimozhi solla

maadEvi ninnuLLamum enaiyeLLa

varuttamuRubava bandamunOygaLum

tarittiramum manavanmai azhikka

karuttin pripura nirmalapada

kamalangaLai en malangeDa vaNangiDa

(kallaada)
